solution_line_template: Out of the {total_children} children taking part in the Halloween celebration, {allowed_percentage} were allowed to draw jelly beans from the bag, a total of {allowed_percentage}*{total_children}=<<{allowed_percentage}*{total_children}={allowed_children}>>{allowed_children} children.

If each of the {allowed_children} children drew two jelly beans out of the bag, they drew a total of {allowed_children}*{jelly_beans_per_child}=<<{allowed_children}*{jelly_beans_per_child}={total_drawn}>>{total_drawn} jelly beans from the bag.
The total number of jelly beans that remained is {initial_jelly_beans}-{total_drawn}=<<{initial_jelly_beans}-{total_drawn}={remaining_jelly_beans}>>{remaining_jelly_beans}
